SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT distinct Z.ZZIMS,P.*, M.*,S.st_name,A.PHO_RT, A.PHO_NUM,pt.up_sta,pt.port_date,pt.port_num FROM PHOTOGRAPHER P, MEMBER M,STUDIO S,(SELECT CTGR_NUM,COUNT(*) ZZIMS FROM ZZIM GROUP BY CTGR_NUM) Z, (SELECT PHO_RT, PHO_NUM, CTGR_NUM FROM PHOTO WHERE PHO_NUM IN (SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(PHO_NUM)) FROM PHOTO WHERE upper(CTGR) = 'P' GROUP BY CTGR_NUM) ORDER BY PHO_NUM) A, PORTFOLIO PT WHERE P.PTG_ID = M.ID and pt.ptg_id = p.ptg_id and A.CTGR_NUM = PT.PORT_NUM AND M.ID = Z.CTGR_NUM(+) AND M.ID = S.ST_ID(+) AND P.PTG_ID = #{ptgId} AND UPPER(PT.UP_STA)='Y' ORDER BY PORT_DATE DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 6) B WHERE RN >= 1
